overview: Bavarian hinterland. Jacky and her best friend Ferdi dream of becoming Topmodels, in order to leave their desolate home village behind. Will they be able to overcome their roots and become stars by competing in a model casting show? Especially for Ferdi, a young man dressed in women's clothes, it is hard to compete against the other models. Will it help to get attention by participating in a porn movie? A story of friendship and the relentless fight for beauty.
title: Fame
